name: Arena 51
description:
When the cute killing machine escapes, what could go wrong?

Arena 51 is a game about controlling the alien to escape the highly protected military base. A  fast-paced top-down shooter focuses on slash and reflection. CREDITS

We are a small team from the Trinity Western University game design program. As this program just launched a year ago. We are not only the newcomer to this community but also the explorer for our program. Hope we can learn more about this beautiful indie community through our interaction with each one of you.

All these young talented peers have a passion for video games. As a newcomer to this indie game community. We are excited to release our very first game "Arena 51". And would love to hear feedback from you to improve ourselves.

Jessika Nickel- Creative Director, 2D Artist
Logan Smith- 2D Artist
Ariel Chihan Caballero- 2D Artist
Tyler Wiebe-Project Manager, Programmer
Dane Munday- Programmer

Anthony Nootebos- Composer, Audio
